meanings.definition: A place where furs are made or sold.
meanings.sent1: The furrieries in town offer a wide selection of warm coats.
meanings.sent2: She visited the furrieries to buy a new hat for winter.
meanings.sent3: The furrieries had a sale, and everyone rushed to get cozy jackets.
meanings.sent4: The furrieries were a treasure trove of soft, luxurious fabrics.
meanings.sent5: Walking into the furrieries felt like stepping into a fluffy cloud.

meanings.definition: The business of dealing in furs.
meanings.sent1: Her family has been in the furrieries for generations.
meanings.sent2: The furrieries industry is booming this year.
meanings.sent3: Starting a furrieries business requires a good eye for quality pelts.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, the furrieries trade is highly competitive.
meanings.sent5: He dreamed of owning a successful furrieries one day.
